title: Customized Science Education Design for Adult Learners Using a Digital Field Experience Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital tools and understanding of andragogy principles
context.additional_context: Conducting real-time/asynchronous blended learning using mobile devices in BYOD environments, with a focus on workplace science applications through industry case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of the Digital Field Experience (DFE) model: asynchronous delivery, real-time field experience, and adult learner-tailored design.
Learners can design a DFE program on scientific topics tailored to mobile environments.
Learners can iteratively improve DFE programs by incorporating formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
